price: Nítorí náà, ṣèrántí. Ìwọ kì í ṣe adábigba tàbí wèrè lórí ìdẹ̀ra Olúwa rẹ.
arabic: فَذَكِّرۡ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِنِعۡمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٖ وَلَا مَجۡنُونٍ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fadhakkir famā anta biniʿ'mati rabbika bikāhinin walā majnūnin
